normal.text: 接收查询用户状态表触发请求

normal.scriptContent:
List < Map > data = dbop.select("Select b.USER_HRID as code From ad_to_bpm_user_mid a Join ps_to_bpm_user_mid b On b.USER_HRID = a.EMPLOYEENUMBER And (b.USER_ACCESSIONSTATE = '离职' or a.ENABLED = 0)", message);
return data;

normal.queries: [{"value":"update OA_EMPLOYEE_H set enable=-1 where code=#[map-payload:code]"},{"value":"update sys_operator  set enable=-1 where code=#[map-payload:code]"}]

normal.description: 提交或者回滚数据库事务

exception.text: 把异常信息替换换行符
exception.description: 把异常信息替换换行符
exception.scriptContent:
String exceptionContent = message.getPayload();String exception = exceptionContent.replace("\n", "
");message.setPayload(exception);return message;
